=== Kicker ===

* Size: 27 pixels (small)

* Applet order: KBFX, Show desktop, Taskbar, System tray, Clock.

* Default running system tray applets: Network monitor (Knemo), Kmix, Update manager, Klipper and Language selector.

* Clock: show date and time, normal font, size 8 - localization

* Misc: hidden handles,
